title: A treatise of the nature of God
author: Morton, Thomas, of Berwick.
publisher: Printed by Tho. Creed for Robert Dexter, dwelling in Pauls Church-yard, at the signe of the Brazen Serpent,
notes: By Thomas Morton of Berwick. Erroneously attributed to Bishop Thomas Morton.
A variant of the edition with Ralph Jackson named as publisher in the imprint.
Some print faded, some print show-through, and some pages stained and torn.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
